TurboChatbot.name: Turbo Chatbot
TurboChatbot.description: Extension to run chatbots inside turbowarp! Unline SOME AI extensions, this lil guy runs on your local device! If you have a beefy PC, good for you! If you have a potato PC well good luck man

TurboPython.name: TurboPython
TurboPython.description: Extension to run Python scripts inside turbowarp
